item.title: Some Cool Songs
item.description: Hey Guys, the year is 2026 and I am bringing this blog back from the grave.

item.title: A Collection of Cadquery Parametric Models (2018-2022)
item.description: The title says it all, but I will elaborate a bit more.

item.title: Jetson Nano Case
item.description: Sometime ago I acquired a jetson nano 2gb SBC and after using it a bit I felt the need to overclock it. The problem is that it runs hot even at default clock speeds, so I needed a fan. But the fan needs to be mounted somewhere right?

item.title: Direct Stiffness Method in Python: Trusses and Frames
item.description: This post is about some finite element method code that I wrote back in 2014. I am sharing it here, even though I never finished the data visualization part I wanted back then.

item.title: f-rep Gears
item.description: I’ve been writing for blogs since 2009 and I always wanted to write about gears. Finally the time has come.

item.title: Gömböc
item.description:
One line of code and you have it!

Weird? Cool? Wizardry?

item.title: ASTM D638 Tensile Test Specimens
item.description: No need to say much about the classical ASTM D638 tensile test specimens AKA dogbones. Just a few remarks:

item.title: Cadquery Chess Set
item.description: A weird project to test my new 3d printer: A chess set designed in cadquery.
